帗字的基本解释

帗
fú
五色帛装饰的一种舞具：“文舞六十四人，……十六人执帗”。
古同“韍”。

帗字的汉语字典释义

[①]［fú］
［《廣韻》分勿切，入物，非。］
(1)五色帛制成的舞具。
(2)通“韍”。蔽膝。

帗字的康熙字典解释

【寅集中】【巾字部】　帗； 康熙笔画：8； 页码：页330第02
【廣韻】分物切【集韻】敷勿切，?音弗。【周禮·春官】凡舞有帗舞。【註】帗析五采繒，今靈星舞子持之是也。　又【廣韻】毳也。【揚子·方言】帗縷，毳也。荆揚江湖之閒曰揄鋪，楚曰??，宋鄭衞之閒謂之帗縷。　又【廣韻】【集韻】?北末切，音撥。【說文】一幅巾也。

考證：〔【揚子·方言】帗縷，毳也。荆揚江湖之閒曰揄舖。〕　謹照原文舖改鋪。
帗字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
帗字的起名意思

五色帛装饰的一种舞具。

object held by dancer
Basic explanation of words
object held by dancer
fú
A dance tool decorated with five-color silk: "Sixty-four people in Wenwu,...sixteen people hold the silk".
Ancient Tong "韍".
object held by dancer
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［fú］
["Guangyun" is divided into do not cut, into things, not. ]
(1) Dance equipment made of five-color silk.
(2) Through "韍". Cover the knees.
object held by dancer
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Collection] [Scarf Character Department] 　帗; Kangxi Strokes: 8; Page Number: Page 330 02
[Guang Yun] Divide things and cut [Ji Yun] Do not cut while applying,? Yin Fu. [Zhou Li·Chun Guan] Every dance has a dance. [Note] The analysis of the five-cai 缯, today Lingxing Wuzi holds the same.　[Guang Yun] Wu Ye. 【Yangtze Dialect】Ailu, 毳ye. The leisure of the rivers and lakes of Jingyang is called 揄pu, the Chu called "??", and the leisure of Song Zhengwei is called the wispy.　[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? North end cut, tone dial. [Said Wen] A towel. Textual research: [[Yangtze Dialect] Ailu, Wuye. The leisure of Jingyang rivers and lakes is said to be a shop. 〕　I would like to change the shop according to the original.
